description: I'm a data scientist with 5 years of experience in machine learning and Python. I work on NLP projects and am interested in transformer models and deep learning.
I'm a software engineer transitioning into ML. I have strong programming skills in Python and Java; and I'm learning about neural networks and data preprocessing.
I'm a research student studying computer science. I'm working on my thesis about attention mechanisms and transformer architectures. I have basic ML knowledge.
I'm a product manager with a technical background. I need to understand ML concepts to work with data science teams. I'm interested in practical applications.
I'm a senior ML engineer specializing in production systems. I have expertise in model deploymen; MLOps; and scaling ML applications. I work with PyTorch and TensorFlow.
